column.name: wjfl
column.annotate: 正常、关注、次级、 可疑、损失

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'账户代号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.default0)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'到期日期输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMMdd!' where f_java_rule_date(t.dqrq,'yyyyMMdd')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'到期日期输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.dqrq)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'发放日期输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMMdd!' where f_java_rule_date(t.ffrq,'yyyyMMdd')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'发放日期输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.ffrq)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'贷款金额输入错误，只能输入:17位整数,2位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.dkje)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.dkje,17,2)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'贷款金额输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.dkje)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'起始日期输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMMdd!' where f_java_rule_date(t.qsrq,'yyyyMMdd')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'起始日期输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.qsrq)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'五级分类输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.wjfl)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set error=error||'账户代号错误!' where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and not exists( select 1 from JXDX_DKZH dk where dk.zhdh=t.default0)

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select default0,qsrq from dkwjfldr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by default0,qsrq having count(1)>1) dr where 1=1 and t.default0=dr.default0 and t.qsrq=dr.qsrq ) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set error=error||'到期日期不正确!' where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and not exists( select 1 from JXDX_DKZH dk where dk.zhdh=t.default0 and dk.dqrq=cast(t.dqrq as integer)) and exists( select 1 from JXDX_DKZH dk where dk.zhdh=t.default0)

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set error=error||'发放日期不正确!' where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and not exists( select 1 from JXDX_DKZH dk where dk.zhdh=t.default0 and dk.ffrq=cast(t.ffrq as integer)) and exists( select 1 from JXDX_DKZH dk where dk.zhdh=t.default0)

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set error=error||'贷款金额不正确!' where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and not exists( select 1 from JXDX_DKZH dk where dk.zhdh=t.default0 and dk.dkje=cast(t.dkje as decimal(17,2))) and exists( select 1 from JXDX_DKZH dk where dk.zhdh=t.default0)

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set error=error||'五级分类错误!' where not exists(select 1 from csb_dmms ms where lower(ms.dmmc)='dkwjfl' and ms.dmms=rtrim(t.wjfl)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists(select 1 from SGLR_DKWJFL tar where 1=1 and t.default0 =tar.ZHDH and tar.QSRQ >= cast(t.qsrq as DECIMAL(22,0)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dkwjfldr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select default0 from dkwjfldr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by default0 having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.default0=dr.default0) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE dkwjfldr_temp ( default0 varchar(100) , dqrq varchar(100) , ffrq varchar(100) , dkje varchar(100) , qsrq varchar(100) , wjfl varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from dkwjfldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from dkwjfldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, default0,dqrq,ffrq,dkje,qsrq,wjfl,khdxdh,error from dkwjfldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, default0,dqrq,ffrq,dkje,qsrq,wjfl,khdxdh,error from dkwjfldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, default0,dqrq,ffrq,dkje,qsrq,wjfl,khdxdh,error from dkwjfldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGLR_DKWJFL tar where exists ( select 1 from $temp$ t where (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null or t.error ='数据已存在!') and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and cast(t.default0 as VARCHAR(40))=tar.ZHDH and tar.qsrq>= cast(t.qsrq as integer) )
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update SGLR_DKWJFL tar set jsrq=(select F_Change_Days(cast(dr.qsrq as Integer),-1) from dkwjfldr_temp dr where 1=1 and cast(dr.default0 as VARCHAR(40))=tar.ZHDH and (length(dr.error)=0 or dr.error is null or dr.error='数据已存在!') and dr.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$) where exists( select 1 from dkwjfldr_temp t where 1=1 and cast(t.default0 as VARCHAR(40))=tar.ZHDH and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null or t.error='数据已存在!') and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and tar.jsrq>=F_Change_Days(cast(t.qsrq as Integer),-1))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update SGLR_DKWJFL tar set jsrq = ( select distinct F_Change_Days(cast(t.qsrq as Integer), -1) from dkwjfldr_temp t inner join JXDX_DKZH dk on dk.zhdh=t.default0 and rtrim(cast(dk.dqrq as char(10))) = t.dqrq and rtrim(cast(dk.ffrq as char(10))) = t.ffrq and dk.dkje = cast(t.dkje as decimal(17,2)) where t.khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$ and cast(dk.zhdh as VARCHAR(40)) = tar.ZHDH and coalesce(length(t.error), 0) = 0 ) where exists ( select 1 from dkwjfldr_temp t inner join JXDX_DKZH dk on dk.zhdh=t.default0 and rtrim(cast(dk.dqrq as char(10)))= t.dqrq and rtrim(cast(dk.ffrq as char(10))) = t.ffrq and dk.dkje = cast(t.dkje as decimal(17,2)) where t.khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$ and cast(dk.zhdh as VARCHAR(40)) = tar.ZHDH and coalesce(length(t.error), 0) = 0) and tar.jsrq = 29991231
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into SGLR_DKWJFL(ZHDH,ZZH,QSRQ,FHDH,WJFL,JSRQ) select zhdh,zzh,qsrq,'' as fhdh,dmz as wjfl,29991231 as jsrq from ( select max(dk.zhdh) zhdh,' ' zzh,t.default0,t.dqrq,t.ffrq,t.dkje, cast(t.qsrq as integer) qsrq, ms.dmz from dkwjfldr_temp t inner join JXDX_DKZH dk on dk.zhdh=t.default0 and rtrim(cast(dk.dqrq as char(10))) = t.dqrq and rtrim(cast(dk.ffrq as char(10))) = t.ffrq and dk.dkje = cast(t.dkje as decimal(17,2)) inner join csb_dmms ms on ms.dmms=rtrim(t.wjfl) and lower(dmmc)='dkwjfl' where t.khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null) group by t.default0,t.dqrq,t.ffrq,t.dkje,t.qsrq, ms.dmz) a
